Summaries.eng:
After the fall of Museum-the evil organization responsible for many crimes in Futo, the production and distribution of Gaia Memories has halted. However, remnants of Gaia Memories still remain within society and are sold on the black market at high prices. Thus, the two heroes from Narumi Detective Office are yet to have time to relax. Sights of Dopants still occur and the agency receives more and more clients who claim to experience supernatural phenomena.

Regardless of the arduous nature of the task, Kamen Rider Double promises that those who hurt Futo will inevitably count up their sins.
Summaries.jpn:
翔太郎とフィリップにより風都は守られたはずだった。しかし街の裏側では未だ怪現象が多発している。
そんな二人の前に姿を現した 謎の美女・ときめ。そして新たなる邪悪な影。今、仮面ライダーWの新たな戦いが幕を開けるーー

Titles.jpn: FUUTO PI - Ending | Tsumi to Batsu to Angura

Titles.eng: Fuuto PI: The Portrait of Kamen Rider Skull
Titles.jpn: 劇場版 風都探偵 仮面ライダースカルの肖像

Summaries.eng: How were the Gaia Memories created? How did Double's battle begin? To answer Tokime's questions, Shotaro quietly begins to talk about how he met and parted with his master, Sokichi Narumi, also known as Kamen Rider Skull.
Summaries.jpn: 風の街・風都でガイアメモリの力を使う怪人・ドーパントが暗躍し始めた頃。若き翔太郎は荘吉の探偵助手となり、半熟と呼ばれながらもその背中を追っていた。探偵稼業の傍らでスカルとして秘密裏に活動する荘吉に、何も知らない翔太郎は焦燥感を募らせる。そんな中、鳴海探偵事務所に一本の電話が…。それは翔太郎たちを運命の夜へと誘う、地獄からの依頼だった!!謎の依頼人からもたらされた“切り札”を届けるべく、荘吉の行方を追った翔太郎が見たものとは…。

Titles.eng: Beware of t / The Man Who Loved a Witch
Titles.jpn: ｔに気をつけろ1／魔女に恋した男

Summaries.eng: In the windy city of Fuuto, private detective Shotaro Hidari works with his friends to protect the citizens... in more ways than one. But a chance encounter with a bewitching femme fatale might spell a whole new kind of trouble for him, and his city.

Titles.eng: Beware of t / The Culprit Is Right There
Titles.jpn: ｔに気をつけろ2／相棒は魔少年

Summaries.eng: The hunt for Tokime continues, but Shotaro begins to have growing doubts about her guilt, which leads to friction with his partner, Philip.

Titles.eng: Beware of t / The Masked Defender

Summaries.eng: The identity of the Road Dopant has been made clear, and Kamen Rider W is here to save the day. But questions still remain. Who is Tokime, and what happened to her memories?

Titles.eng: The Terrible m / Wings of Death

Summaries.eng: When a popular video game company's idol-spokeswoman/head developer starts receiving death threats, the Narumi Detective Agency is brought in to protect her.

Titles.eng: The Terrible m / The Sound of a Leak

Summaries.eng: Shotaro is injured defending the video game idol, Megu Kazamatsuri, leaving Philip in charge of the investigation. But can he and Tokime put aside their differences to protect their client?

Despite Shotaro's condition, still in the rest room, Philip transforms into Kamen Rider to confront his enemy. His way of fighting is different, but the objective remains the same: to protect Monako, alias Meg.
Summaries.jpn: 翔太郎の状態にもかかわらず、まだトイレにいるフィリップは仮面ライダーに変身して敵に立ち向かう.戦い方は違うが、目的は変わらず、モナコことメグを守ること。

Titles.eng: The Closed k / Dynamic Duo, Deserted
Titles.jpn: 閉ざされたk／名コンビ遭難

Summaries.eng: After a flight of fancy leaves Shotaro and Philip stranded in the mountains during a blizzard, they stumble onto a mansion that hosts a bizarre ritual.

Titles.eng: The Closed k / A Chain of Malice

Summaries.eng: Shotaro and Philip struggle to discover the truth behind the Alcohol Dopant's attacks before there's another death.

Titles.eng: The Closed k / The Ultimate Two Halves of One

Summaries.eng: A confrontation erupts when the Alcohol Dopant's true identity is revealed, while Kamen Rider Accel battles the gruesome Scream.

Titles.eng: Superhuman r / A Passport to Shadow Fuuto

Summaries.eng: A young girl contacts the Narumi Detective Agency about her missing grandfather. But what does her case have to do with Shadow Fuuto?

Titles.eng: Superhuman r / In Search of a Connection

Summaries.eng: W and Accel are forced out of Shadow Fuuto by the nuclear-powered Nikaido and his army of monstrous Road Dopants. Will they find their way back in time to rescue Tokime and Rentaro?
